page.title: 12Turnditch + Windley Stores
page.content:
Mrs. J Wilson has been running the Turnditch and Windley Stores for 18 years now. She had alsways wanted to run a shop. Previously, it had been a butcher's shop. The shop is open from 9.00a.m. until 5.30p.m., the busiest day being Friday and the quietest Tuesday. There have been changes over the years: she does not sell paraffin or fireworks now. When we visited the shop in July,we found the cost of some items and also from where they came.
{lettuce from Yorkshire 22p {cucumber from the East Coast 38p {tomatoes from the East Coast 56p/lb {potatoes from Pembrokeshire 10p/lb {apples from France 38p/lb {oranges from Israel 16p {bananas from Jamaica 48p/lb {
